content: वनस्पतिः [वनस्य पतिः नि° सुट्] {@--1@} A large forest tree, especially one that bears fruit apparently without any blossoms. {@--2@} A tree in general; तमाशु विघ्नं तपसस्तपस्वी वनस्पतिं वज्र इवावभज्य <ls>Ku. 3. 74.</ls> {@--3@} The Soma plant. {@--4@} A stem, trunk. {@--5@} A beam; pole, post. {@--6@} A sacrificial post. {@--7@} An offering to {%Vanaspati%}. {@--8@} A wooden amulet. {@--9@} A scaffold. {@--10@} An ascetic.
